entry.title: Newsletter #115
entry.content:
Hi folks!

Alex and Oba are back from DockerCon Europe 2015. Looks like Oba and Cirpo had fun at DockerCon.

Below you can find the usual list of interesting articles we discovered in the past 7 days.

  • 7 essential slack integrations developers should know | takipi blog

  • a new era of commerce innovation | magento

  • coreos introduces clair: open source vulnerability analysis for your containers

  • creating a fake api with hapi for your client-side application – node.js video tutorial

  • deploy and manage any cluster manager with docker swarm

  • dockercon eu 2015: docker trusted registry 1.4 with integrated content trust and universal control plane

  • fsto: re-evaluating front-end peformance best practices // speaker deck

  • hey isis! check out how ‘idiot’ anonymous hackers can disrupt your online propaganda – the hacker news

  • jcuga/golongpoll

  • jessie frazelle’s blog: docker containers on the desktop

  • nature/shunter

  • node.js at netflix with yunong xiao | software engineering daily

  • on currying and partial function application

  • phpspec & behat: two testing tools that write code for you

  • progressive web apps: escaping tabs without losing our soul – infrequently noted

  • react at facebook with ben alpert – software engineering daily

  • redux – predictable state container for javascript apps

  • server-side rendering with redux and react-router | codementor

  • six years of go

  • software engineer traits — engineering leadership — medium

  • source code poetry

  • the offline cookbook – jakearchibald.com

  • the origin of the 8-hour work day and why we should rethink it

  • unicorns dropping like flies: first dropbox; then square; now fidelity cuts snapchat valuation by 25%

  • what the web platform can learn from node.js – atlassian developers

  • zero notifications

entry.title: Newsletter #105
entry.content:
Hi! It’s TechThursday again!

To prove that we are not joking around we are porting microservices (sometimes not that micro) to the basketball playground! :P

This is a picture of our team mates after a 3 vs 3 session!

And here’s your reading list for the weekend!

Enjoy!

  • A heads up display for git

  • A week with elixir

  • BDD vs TDD – western devs

  • Billion-dollar companies over the last decade

  • Billions of request per day meet go 1.5 — medium

  • Building a simple react application using the flux pattern: a step-by-step guide | tony spiro

  • Building price-aware applications using ec2 spot instances

  • Cross compiled go with alpine linux and docker

  • Daily stand-up meetings are a good tool for a bad manager – yegor bugayenko

  • Ever seen a container named boring_wozniak?

  • How to share docker volumes across hosts

  • Life of a ticket – airbnb engineering

  • Making painless schema changes

  • Min-maxing software costs

  • news.js.org: spreading the news about javascript since 2015

  • Presentation domain data layering

  • Stop using react for everything!

  • Stream faqs

  • Symptom-based monitoring at ticketmaster

entry.title: Newsletter #102
entry.content:
Guess what? It’s TechThursday again!

Devour this awesome list of links during the upcoming weekend folks!

  • Testing in GO

  • Designing APIs for Asynchrony

  • JAWS: The Javascript + AWS Stack

  • codedoodl.es: a showcase of curated creative coding sketches

  • A brief history of scaling linkedin

  • A ssh server that knows who you are. $ ssh whoami.filippo.io

  • A visual introduction to machine learning

  • Add instant search to your blog or documentation using our jekyll plugin

  • An introduction to bdd from konstantin kudryashov

  • Bringing the python data stack to the shell prompt

  • Centralized docker container logging with native graylog integration | open source log management with graylog

  • Data science blogs

  • Docker is coming whether you like it or not | kyle baley

  • Don’t test with sqllite when you use postgres in production

  • Exploring es2016 decorators

  • Facebook: our drones will use lasers to deliver 10gbps internet access

  • Get ready for the future — javascript scene — medium

  • Gophercon 2015 roundup – the go blog

  • Healthchecks.io – get notified when your cron jobs fail

  • How an enterprise begins its big data journey

  • How i am maintaining multiple emails for git on a same machine

  • Mobile number login

  • Mycli: a mysql client with auto-completion and syntax highlighting

  • New in symfony 2.8: redesigned web debug toolbar (symfony blog)

  • Non-blocking asynchronous json.parse using the fetch api

  • React-dragula: drag and drop so simple it hurts

  • Scaling the datagram team – instagram engineering

  • Speeding up database calls with pdo and iterators

  • Starting now at netflix: unlimited maternity and paternity leave

  • Stopping docker containers gracefully – techbar

  • Terminology – why are good programmers referred to as ninjas? – programmers stack exchange

  • Testinfra test your infrastructure

  • The magic tricks of testing by sandi metz

  • The secret of devops: it’s always been about people, not technology
